HEADLINE: Dogecoin Retests Crucial Support Following 8.6% Drop ‚Äì Here Are The Levels To Watch
SUMMARY: Dogecoin (DOGE) has retraced alongside the rest of the market to retest a crucial level as support. Some analysts suggest that holding its current price range would set the stage for reclaiming the next key area. Related Reading: PENGU Leads Top Memecoin List Amid 20% Daily Surge ‚Äì What‚Äôs Behind The Rally? Dogecoin Retests Breakout Levels On Wednesday, Dogecoin momentum saw a momentary pause as Bitcoin and most of the market‚Äôs rally slowed down. The leading memecoin has recorded a massive run over the past week, increasing over 25% in the last seven days. At the start of the month, DOGE recovered from the June pullback and climbed to the $0.20 level for the first time since May. After reclaiming this crucial level mid-July, the cryptocurrency consolidated around this area, building a base before resuming its bullish run last Wednesday. Over the weekend, Dogecoin broke out of the $0.23-$0.24 resistance, soaring past the May highs to hit the $0.28 area on Monday. The token near this level on Tuesday, hovering between the $0.26-$0.27 price range. However, today‚Äôs pullback saw the memecoin drop approximately 9% in the daily timeframe and retest its breakout level around the $0.23 mark. Despite the correction, crypto analyst Kaleo affirmed that ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre not stacking Dogecoin on the retest of this breakout, you‚Äôre wrong.‚Äù The analyst highlighted that the token is repeating its Q4 2024 performance, when it retested its breakout level as support before starting the explosive rise to its multi-year high of $0.48. Amid the retracement, Ali Martinez also asserted that DOGE is retesting the neckline of its double bottom pattern, situated around the $0.25 mark. To the analyst, ‚ÄúThis is a key support zone that could offer a solid entry point before the next leg up.‚Äù Notably, he previously suggested that as long as the token holds this area as support, a rally toward the $0.33-$0.40 is likely, adding that the next major resistance barrier is at $0.36. DOGE Weekly And Monthly To Determine Next Move Rekt Capital noted that Dogecoin has successfully retested its multi-year technical uptrend as support, which enabled its rally to the upside. He explained that price is currently ‚Äúpressing beyond its pre-halving highs,‚Äù around the $0.22 level. A monthly close above this area would position Dogecoin price for a post-breakout retest of this level as support in August. The analyst highlighted that DOGE‚Äôs Pre-Bitcoin halving levels are confluent with the neckline of the double bottom pattern recorded in the Weekly chart. Rekt Capital explained that ‚Äúany dips on the Weekly timeframe into the ~$0.22 region would figure a post-breakout retest attempt of the Double Bottom to fully confirm a breakout, whereas on the Monthly any dips would figure as a key technical milestone to finally turn Pre-Halving highs into new support.‚Äù Related Reading: Ethereum Price On The Verge: Banks And State Buy To Push ETH Above $5,500? Nonetheless, Dogecoin‚Äôs re-challenge of the $0.27 resistance depends on the success of the ongoing retests, as it would signal that this area is weakening as a rejection point and making a reclaim more likely during the next attempt. As of this writing, Dogecoin is trading at $0.24, a 54% increase in the monthly timeframe. Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com

To the analyst, ‚ÄúThis is a key support zone that could offer a solid entry point before the next leg up.‚Äù Notably, he previously suggested that as long as the token holds this area as support, a rally toward the $0.33-$0.40 is likely, adding that the next major resistance barrier is at $0.36. DOGE Weekly And Monthly To Determine Next Move Rekt Capital noted that Dogecoin has successfully retested its multi-year technical uptrend as support, which enabled its rally to the upside. He explained that price is currently ‚Äúpressing beyond its pre-halving highs,‚Äù around the $0.22 level. A monthly close above this area would position Dogecoin price for a post-breakout retest of this level as support in August. The analyst highlighted that DOGE‚Äôs Pre-Bitcoin halving levels are confluent with the neckline of the double bottom pattern recorded in the Weekly chart. Rekt Capital explained that ‚Äúany dips on the Weekly timeframe into the ~$0.22 region would figure a post-breakout retest attempt of the Double Bottom to fully confirm a breakout, whereas on the Monthly any dips would figure as a key technical milestone to finally turn Pre-Halving highs into new support.‚Äù Related Reading: Ethereum Price On The Verge: Banks And State Buy To Push ETH Above $5,500? Nonetheless, Dogecoin‚Äôs re-challenge of the $0.27 resistance depends on the success of the ongoing retests, as it would signal that this area is weakening as a rejection point and making a reclaim more likely during the next attempt. As of this writing, Dogecoin is trading at $0.24, a 54% increase in the monthly timeframe. Featured Image from Unsplash.com, Chart from TradingView.com

HEADLINE: Finder Earn: A Landmark Victory for Crypto Innovation in Australia
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Finder Earn: A Landmark Victory for Crypto Innovation in Australia The world of cryptocurrency is constantly evolving, often outstripping the pace of traditional regulation. In Australia, a recent court decision has sent ripples through the fintech sector, providing much-needed clarity on the legal status of certain crypto-related products. Specifically, the Australian Federal Court has delivered a landmark ruling regarding Finder Earn , a yield-generating product offered by the popular fintech company Finder.com. This decision, which found that Finder Earn is not a financial product under Australian law, marks a significant moment for crypto innovation and regulatory frameworks down under. What Exactly is Finder Earn , and Why Was It Under Scrutiny? To understand the significance of this ruling, it is crucial to first grasp what Finder Earn is and why it attracted the attention of the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC). Finder Earn was a product that allowed Finder.com customers to deposit Australian dollars (AUD) with the promise of a fixed, attractive yield. Finder would then use these AUD deposits to invest in a portfolio of digital assets, primarily stablecoins and other cryptocurrencies, through third-party platforms. The returns generated from these investments were then passed back to the customers. ASIC, Australia‚Äôs corporate regulator, viewed Finder Earn with concern. Their primary argument was that the product constituted an ‚Äòunlicensed financial product,‚Äô specifically a ‚Äòmanaged investment scheme‚Äô or a ‚Äòdeposit facility‚Äô that should be regulated under the Corporations Act 2001. ASIC‚Äôs mandate is to protect consumers and ensure market integrity, and they believed that products like Finder Earn , offering returns on pooled funds, carried risks that required the oversight and protections afforded by financial product licensing. The regulator‚Äôs contention was that customers were essentially pooling their money, with Finder managing the investments on their behalf, and expecting a return from those efforts. This structure, in ASIC‚Äôs view, resembled traditional financial products that are subject to stringent regulations designed to safeguard investors. The legal battle centered on whether the specific mechanics and characteristics of Finder Earn fit the existing definitions of regulated financial products. The Federal Court‚Äôs Unanimous Verdict: What Does It Mean for Finder Earn ? After a thorough examination, the Australian Federal Court ruled decisively in favor of Finder.com, upholding the initial decision that Finder Earn is not a financial product. This ruling means that the product, as structured, does not fall under the purview of Australia‚Äôs Corporations Act as a ‚Äòmanaged investment scheme‚Äô or a ‚Äòfinancial product‚Äô requiring specific licensing and disclosure obligations. The court‚Äôs reasoning hinged on a critical distinction: while Finder Earn did involve a ‚Äòdeposit facility,‚Äô it did not meet the criteria of a ‚Äòmanaged investment scheme‚Äô because customers were not pooling their money to produce a return from the ‚Äòcollective efforts‚Äô of the scheme‚Äôs operator. Instead, the court viewed it more akin to a simple debt or loan arrangement where Finder owed the customers their principal plus a fixed interest rate, regardless of the underlying performance of Finder‚Äôs digital asset investments. The risk was primarily counterparty risk with Finder, rather than investment risk in a pooled fund managed by Finder. Here‚Äôs a simplified breakdown of the court‚Äôs key findings: Not a Managed Investment Scheme: The court determined that the returns on Finder Earn were fixed and independent of the performance of the underlying crypto assets managed by Finder. Customers were not investing in a scheme where their returns depended on the collective efforts of Finder in managing a portfolio. A Deposit Facility, But Not a Financial Product: While the product was acknowledged as a ‚Äòdeposit facility‚Äô where customers deposited money, it did not automatically qualify as a ‚Äòfinancial product‚Äô requiring specific licensing under the Corporations Act in the context ASIC argued. Focus on Contractual Obligation: The relationship was primarily a contractual one where Finder owed a fixed return, similar to a loan, rather than an investment where the customer bore the direct risk of the underlying asset performance. This nuanced interpretation highlights the challenges regulators face in applying existing laws to novel crypto products that often blur the lines between traditional financial instruments and new digital asset functionalities. Why is This Finder Earn Ruling a Game-Changer for Australian Crypto? The Federal Court‚Äôs decision on Finder Earn is far more than just a win for one company; it establishes a significant legal precedent for the entire Australian cryptocurrency and fintech landscape. This ruling provides a degree of regulatory certainty that has long been sought by businesses oper

HEADLINE: Onchain Analysis Platform CryptoQuant Reveals the Source of Bitcoin''s Recent Rise! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: According to on-chain analytics platform CryptoQuant, the current Bitcoin bull cycle is largely driven by institutional investors and individuals with high portfolio values. CryptoQuant: Bitcoin Rise Driven by Institutions, Retail Investors Not Yet Involved Analysts state that individual investors have tended to sell since the beginning of 2023, while institutions have entered a period of serious accumulation since the beginning of 2024. According to Google Trends data, search volumes for ‚ÄúBitcoin‚Äù are still low, and the FOMO (fear of missing out) behavior driven by retail investors seen during the 2021 bull market is absent. This suggests that retail investors have not yet entered the market on a large scale. CryptoQuant analysts argue that this could be a positive sign for the market, as the fact that retail investors have not yet entered the game suggests that Bitcoin prices could rise even higher. However, it is also emphasized that the moment when individual investors enter the market en masse may indicate that this cycle is nearing its end. This analysis reveals that institutional interest is at the core of the current rally and that the market has not yet reached saturation. *This is not investment advice. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Investment: Satsuma Technology‚Äôs Bold ¬£100M Move Unlocks New Frontiers
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Investment: Satsuma Technology‚Äôs Bold ¬£100M Move Unlocks New Frontiers In a significant development that underscores the growing convergence of cutting-edge technology and digital assets, UK-listed AI infrastructure company Satsuma Technology has announced the successful closure of its secured convertible loan note offering, raising just over ¬£100 million (approximately $135.5 million). This substantial funding is earmarked for two key areas: bolstering their Bitcoin investment strategy and covering essential operating expenses. This move marks a pivotal moment for Satsuma Technology, especially following its recent rebranding from Tao Alpha and its declared intent to strengthen its Bitcoin treasury. What does this mean for the company, and why is a substantial Bitcoin investment a core part of their future? What Exactly is a Convertible Loan, and Why is it Key to Satsuma‚Äôs Bitcoin Investment? To truly appreciate the significance of Satsuma Technology‚Äôs announcement, it‚Äôs helpful to understand the financial instrument at its core: the secured convertible loan note. Unlike traditional loans, a convertible loan offers a unique blend of debt and equity, providing flexibility for both the issuer and the investor. A Hybrid Instrument: At its essence, a convertible loan starts as a debt instrument, meaning Satsuma Technology has borrowed money that accrues interest. However, it comes with a crucial caveat: the lender has the option to convert the debt into equity (shares in the company) at a predetermined price or a discount to a future valuation event. Benefits for Satsuma: For a company like Satsuma, especially one focused on high-growth sectors like AI and pursuing a significant Bitcoin investment strategy, this structure offers several advantages: Immediate Capital Injection: It provides immediate access to substantial capital without the immediate dilution of existing shareholders, which would occur with a direct equity raise. Deferred Valuation: It allows the company to defer a formal valuation until a later stage, potentially when its growth and market position are stronger, leading to a higher valuation for equity conversion. Lower Initial Interest Rates: Convertible loans often carry lower interest rates than traditional debt, as investors are compensated by the potential upside of converting to equity. Benefits for Investors: Investors in Satsuma‚Äôs convertible loan gain the security of a debt instrument (it‚Äôs ‚Äòsecured,‚Äô meaning there‚Äôs collateral) while also retaining the exciting upside potential of participating in the company‚Äôs growth if it performs well, especially given its bold Bitcoin investment strategy. The fact that this loan is ‚Äòsecured‚Äô adds an extra layer of confidence for investors, indicating a lower risk profile compared to unsecured debt. This substantial funding, as reported by Investigate, provides Satsuma with the financial muscle to execute its ambitious plans. Satsuma‚Äôs Strategic Evolution: Why a Strong Bitcoin Investment Treasury? Satsuma Technology‚Äôs journey has seen a notable strategic pivot, highlighted by its rebranding from Tao Alpha and a clear declaration of intent to strengthen its Bitcoin treasury strategy. This isn‚Äôt just about holding some digital assets; it‚Äôs a deliberate and calculated move that reflects a deeper understanding of macroeconomics and the evolving financial landscape. Why would an AI infrastructure company commit to a robust Bitcoin investment strategy? Inflation Hedge and Store of Value: In an era of increasing global economic uncertainty and inflationary pressures, many corporations are looking for alternatives to traditional fiat currencies. Bitcoin, often dubbed ‚Äòdigital gold,‚Äô is seen by many as a decentralized, scarce asset that can act as a hedge against inflation and a reliable store of value over the long term. Digital Gold Narrative: Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply cap (21 million coins) contrasts sharply with the potentially infinite supply of fiat currencies, which can be devalued by central bank policies. This scarcity is a core tenet of its appeal as a long-term Bitcoin investment . Strategic Diversification: For a forward-thinking company like Satsuma, adding Bitcoin to its treasury provides diversification away from traditional assets, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk in the long run. Alignment with Innovation: As an AI infrastructure company, Satsuma operates at the forefront of technological innovation. Embracing Bitcoin, a groundbreaking digital asset, aligns with its core identity and vision for the future. It signals a willingness to adopt pioneering technologies not just in its primary business but also in its financial management. This commitment to a Bitcoin investment strategy positions Satsuma Technology among a growing list of public companies that are recognizing Bitcoin‚Äôs potential beyond mere speculation, viewing it as a legitimate treasury asset. How Will This ¬£100M Fuel Both AI Infrastructure and Bit
TAGS: Crypto News|AI Infrastructure|BITCOIN|Convertible Loan|Crypto Funding|Satsuma Technology

HEADLINE: Sustainable Crypto Mining: Bitzero‚Äôs Bold $25M Boost for a Greener Future
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Sustainable Crypto Mining: Bitzero‚Äôs Bold $25M Boost for a Greener Future In a significant stride towards a more environmentally conscious digital economy, the crypto mining landscape is witnessing a pivotal shift. One firm leading this charge, Bitzero, has recently secured a substantial $25 million in funding, earmarking it for a monumental expansion into sustainable crypto mining . This investment isn‚Äôt just about growth; it‚Äôs a powerful statement about the future of digital asset creation, emphasizing efficiency, profitability, and environmental responsibility. For anyone interested in the intersection of finance, technology, and ecological stewardship, Bitzero‚Äôs latest move offers a compelling glimpse into what‚Äôs possible. What Does Bitzero‚Äôs $25 Million Investment Mean for Sustainable Crypto Mining ? Bitzero‚Äôs recent capital injection, as reported by The Block, is a game-changer. The $25 million will primarily be utilized to acquire 2,900 state-of-the-art Bitmain S21 Pro miners. For those familiar with the intricacies of crypto mining hardware, the S21 Pro is a beacon of efficiency, known for its superior hashing power and improved energy consumption compared to older models. This strategic acquisition is projected to elevate Bitzero‚Äôs annual revenue by an impressive $10 million, showcasing a clear path to both financial success and environmental benefit. This isn‚Äôt merely an upgrade; it‚Äôs a strategic move that solidifies Bitzero‚Äôs commitment to low-carbon operations. The company‚Äôs existing footprint spans North America and Europe, regions increasingly prioritizing renewable energy sources. By focusing on hydro-powered mining, Bitzero is not just reducing its carbon footprint but also setting a precedent for how large-scale crypto operations can align with global sustainability goals. Why is Sustainable Crypto Mining More Crucial Than Ever Before? The conversation around crypto mining has often been overshadowed by concerns about its energy consumption. Traditional mining operations, especially those reliant on fossil fuels, have faced criticism for their environmental impact. This has led to a growing demand from investors, regulators, and the public for greener alternatives. Sustainable crypto mining addresses these concerns head-on by leveraging renewable energy sources such as hydropower, solar, wind, and geothermal. The benefits extend beyond environmental stewardship: Reduced Carbon Footprint: Minimizes greenhouse gas emissions, contributing to climate change mitigation. Lower Operational Costs: Renewable energy can often provide more stable and predictable energy costs compared to volatile fossil fuel markets. Enhanced Reputation: Companies adopting sustainable practices build trust and appeal to a broader, environmentally conscious investor base. Regulatory Compliance: Positions firms favorably amidst increasing global regulations targeting energy-intensive industries. Long-Term Viability: Ensures the industry‚Äôs future by aligning with global efforts towards a net-zero economy. Bitzero‚Äôs focus on hydro-powered solutions positions it at the forefront of this critical evolution, demonstrating that profitability and planetary health can go hand-in-hand. How Does Bitzero‚Äôs Hydro-Powered Approach Champion Green Crypto Mining ? Bitzero‚Äôs operational model is built on the foundation of hydropower, a renewable energy source that harnesses the kinetic energy of flowing water to generate electricity. This method is lauded for its minimal environmental impact compared to fossil fuels, producing virtually no greenhouse gas emissions during operation. The strategic choice of North America and Europe for its operations is not coincidental. Both continents boast abundant hydroelectric resources and robust energy grids capable of supporting large-scale mining activities. By strategically locating its facilities near these hydro-powered sources, Bitzero achieves several key advantages: Consistent Energy Supply: Unlike solar or wind, hydropower often provides a more consistent and reliable energy flow, reducing downtime and optimizing mining efficiency. Cost Efficiency: Access to cheap, abundant renewable energy directly translates to lower operational expenses, enhancing profitability. Environmental Leadership: Operating with a near-zero carbon footprint distinguishes Bitzero as a leader in responsible digital asset creation. Community Integration: Often, hydropower projects are integrated into existing regional energy infrastructures, fostering positive relationships with local communities and utilities. This commitment to hydro-power illustrates Bitzero‚Äôs holistic approach to sustainable crypto mining , ensuring that its expansion is not just about scale, but also about setting a benchmark for environmental excellence. For anyone interested in the intersection of finance, technology, and ecological stewardship, Bitzero‚Äôs latest move offers a compelling glimpse into what‚Äôs possible. What Does Bitzero‚Äôs $25 Million Investment Mean for Sustainable Crypto Mining ? Bitzero‚Äôs recent capital injection, as reported by The Block, is a game-changer. The $25 million will primarily be utilized to acquire 2,900 state-of-the-art Bitmain S21 Pro miners. For those familiar with the intricacies of crypto mining hardware, the S21 Pro is a beacon of efficiency, known for its superior hashing power and improved energy consumption compared to older models. This strategic acquisition is projected to elevate Bitzero‚Äôs annual revenue by an impressive $10 million, showcasing a clear path to both financial success and environmental benefit. This isn‚Äôt merely an upgrade; it‚Äôs a strategic move that solidifies Bitzero‚Äôs commitment to low-carbon operations. The company‚Äôs existing footprint spans North America and Europe, regions increasingly prioritizing renewable energy sources. By focusing on hydro-powered mining, Bitzero is not just reducing its carbon footprint but also setting a precedent for how large-scale crypto operations can align with global sustainability goals. Why is Sustainable Crypto Mining More Crucial Than Ever Before? The conversation around crypto mining has often been overshadowed by concerns about its energy consumption. Traditional mining operations, especially those reliant on fossil fuels, have faced criticism for their environmental impact. This has led to a growing demand from investors, regulators, and the public for greener alternatives. Sustainable crypto mining addresses these concerns head-on by leveraging renewable energy sources such as hydropower, solar, wind, and geothermal. The benefits extend beyond environmental stewardship: Reduced Carbon Footprint: Minimizes greenhouse gas emissions, contributing to climate change mitigation. Lower Operational Costs: Renewable energy can often provide more stable and predictable energy costs compared to volatile fossil fuel markets. Enhanced Reputation: Companies adopting sustainable practices build trust and appeal to a broader, environmentally conscious investor base. Regulatory Compliance: Positions firms favorably amidst increasing global regulations targeting energy-intensive industries. Long-Term Viability: Ensures the industry‚Äôs future by aligning with global efforts towards a net-zero economy. Bitzero‚Äôs focus on hydro-powered solutions positions it at the forefront of this critical evolution, demonstrating that profitability and planetary health can go hand-in-hand. How Does Bitzero‚Äôs Hydro-Powered Approach Champion Green Crypto Mining ? Bitzero‚Äôs operational model is built on the foundation of hydropower, a renewable energy source that harnesses the kinetic energy of flowing water to generate electricity. This method is lauded for its minimal environmental impact compared to fossil fuels, producing virtually no greenhouse gas emissions during operation. The strategic choice of North America and Europe for its operations is not coincidental. Both continents boast abundant hydroelectric resources and robust energy grids capable of supporting large-scale mining activities. By strategically locating its facilities near these hydro-powered sources, Bitzero achieves several key advantages: Consistent Energy Supply: Unlike solar or wind, hydropower often provides a more consistent and reliable energy flow, reducing downtime and optimizing mining efficiency. Cost Efficiency: Access to cheap, abundant renewable energy directly translates to lower operational expenses, enhancing profitability. Environmental Leadership: Operating with a near-zero carbon footprint distinguishes Bitzero as a leader in responsible digital asset creation. Community Integration: Often, hydropower projects are integrated into existing regional energy infrastructures, fostering positive relationships with local communities and utilities. This commitment to hydro-power illustrates Bitzero‚Äôs holistic approach to sustainable crypto mining , ensuring that its expansion is not just about scale, but also about setting a benchmark for environmental excellence. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Dominance Spikes as Altcoin Season Index Crashes ‚Äì Is a Sell-off Coming?
SUMMARY: The post Bitcoin Dominance Spikes as Altcoin Season Index Crashes ‚Äì Is a Sell-off Coming? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The cryptocurrency market is experiencing a shift in trend. In the wake of sharp capital flows and rapid changes in investor sentiment, Bitcoin is once again asserting its supremacy. The total crypto market cap has dipped to $3.82 trillion, a decline of 2.75%, even as 24-hour trading volumes soared to $222 billion. Meanwhile, Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance has climbed to 61.52% and Ethereum holds 11.3%. Further highlighting that the ongoing retreat from altcoins, as the Altcoin Season Index drops to just 34/100. With the Fear & Greed Index flashing greed at 67, the market stands at a crossroads between opportunity and caution. If you are one of the curious minds who are keen on what the future might hold, this analysis is for you. Bitcoin Takes Center Stage as Capital Rotates Again? Recent data shows a reversion to ‚ÄúBitcoin season,‚Äù marked by robust inflows into BTC. Investors, fearing uncertain macro catalysts, are reallocating from riskier altcoins into the perceived safety of Bitcoin. This shift is underlined by the dominance metric surpassing 61%, levels not seen since past cycles of heightened caution or anticipation for major Bitcoin-specific catalysts. Source: CoinMarketCap At the same time, the market‚Äôs total value has slipped, indicating possible profit-taking, or de-risking. However, the 13.26% surge in trading volume hints at hectic repositioning. Altcoin Season on Pause? The Altcoin Season Index at only 34/100 signals that fewer top altcoins are outperforming Bitcoin. Historically, this metric suggests traders are consolidating holdings into BTC, either due to regulatory nerves, lack of major altcoin narratives, or simply to avoid risks. Source: CoinMarketCap Supporting this, on-chain activity points to increased Bitcoin holding durations, which we call ‚Äúdiamond hands‚Äù. Where we see thickening order books and consistent net outflows of BTC from exchanges. Each is contributing to supportive price action for Bitcoin while altcoins lag. Successively, the Fear & Greed Index at 67 reflects ongoing appetite for risk, but in the context of falling altcoin performance. Much of this ‚Äúgreed‚Äù may be directed at Bitcoin rather than speculative plays. The narrative is rich in FOMO, but also conscious of downside risk in less liquid assets. The Road Ahead: What to Watch Regulatory clarity or ETF-led institutional flows could further enhance Bitcoin‚Äôs leadership. ETH‚Äôs relative underperformance with an 11.3% dominance may persist if scaling debates and L2 solutions fail to reignite excitement. Renewed risk appetite could bring swift altcoin rebounds, but for now, discipline favors established assets. FAQs Why is Bitcoin dominance rising right now? Investors are moving funds into Bitcoin as a safer play amid recent market volatility and macro uncertainties. With the Altcoin Season Index at 34, is the bull run for altcoins lost? The market is currently favoring BTC over altcoins, possibly to avoid risks. We can expect the trend to renew once the sentiments stabilize.

HEADLINE: Crypto wrap: BTC steady but PUMP, Flare, and Aptos among big altcoin losers
SUMMARY: The cryptocurrency market remains largely bullish, but traders are reeling from a sharp downturn seen during the Asian hours on July 24. As most altcoins flipped negative on the 24 hour timeframe, the global market capitalization fell 1.5% to $3.89 trillion, according to CoinMarketCap data. Meanwhile, global trading volume over the past 24 hours reached $225 billion, up 20% amid heightened activity. But as most analysts note, the volatile conditions aside, market sentiment leans bullish. In the short term, attention is on the significant altcoin declines. PUMP, Flare, and Aptos rank among biggest losers today, even as Bitcoin shows resilience. Over $960 million liquidated as altcoins fall Crypto market‚Äôs sharp decline has come amid more than $960 million in liquidations in the past 24 hours. According to Coinglass data , total liquidations jumped more than 260% in the past 24 hours, the majority of those wiped out being long positions. Data shows $828 million in bullish bets wiped out in the past day, a lot of this coming on the back of traders being caught off-guard by sharp altcoin declines. Per Coinglass, leveraged positions with Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL) and XRP contributed significantly to the liquidated longs tally. Bitcoin saw $81 million in leveraged positions rekt. The downturn appears driven by profit-taking following recent market highs, as well as macroeconomic uncertainties. Bitcoin steady as BTC price rebounds to $118k While Bitcoin (BTC) has failed to keep bears off following its run to a new all-time high, the bellwether crypto continues to demonstrate stability. Bulls have rebounded to highs of $118,377 after a brief stall below $117k. As altcoins shed some gains, this resilience has Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance back above 61%. Ethereum dominance is at 11%. Bitcoin‚Äôs price has hovered around $117,000‚Äì$118,000 this week, supported by robust capital flows and institutional demand. Notably, on-chain metrics indicate traders are showing some cautious optimism. Yet, with reduced profit-taking and steady accumulation by large holders, the overall take is that the leg up isn‚Äôt done. PUMP, Flare, and Aptos top losers in 24 hours Among the hardest-hit altcoins, PUMP, Flare, and Aptos led the losses over the past 24 hours. PUMP, a meme-driven token, plummeted by 18% to $0.003. Glassnode analysts say investors might want to cautious amid potential froth. glassnode @glassnode ¬∑ Follow Altcoins are showing broad strength following #Bitcoin ‚Äôs lead, but surging open interest across the sector suggests speculative froth may be building, raising the risk of sharper volatility ahead.Discover more in the latest Week On-Chain belowüëá glassno.de/4o927B4 3:40 pm ¬∑ 23 Jul 2025 281 Reply Copy link Read 26 replies Elsewhere , Flare (FLR) gave up recent gains as price dropped more than 16% to $0.022. The FLR token jumped early in the week amid key network metrics. The Aptos (APT) token, native to the high-throughput blockchain platform for decentralized finance, was down 15% to $4.65. Like the other altcoins, Aptos‚Äô price was down amid profit-taking. The post Crypto wrap: BTC steady but PUMP, Flare, and Aptos among big altcoin losers appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: BNB Hits All-Time High as Alt Season Beckons
SUMMARY: BNB, the native token of BNB Chain and the broader Binance ecosystem, has hit an all-time high (ATH) this week after surpassing $800. The milestone attests to the significant progress Binance has made in its relentless quest to expand the token‚Äôs utility and integrations. But there‚Äôs also another reason why BNB‚Äôs ATH should be a cause for cheer, even for those not holding the asset: it may be the first signs that an altcoin season is coming. BNB Goes ATH On July 23, BNB hit its all-time high of over $800 per token, giving it a market cap of around $112B . Not bad for a token that launched eight years ago priced at $0.15 and which is now a top five crypto asset. During the intervening period, Binance and BNB have both been on quite the ride, complete with the ups and downs that are characteristic of crypto. But lately, it‚Äôs been almost exclusively Up Only for the Binance ecosystem and this progress has been reflected on the charts as BNB‚Äôs momentum looks poised to send it higher still. From a technical perspective, there are plenty of reasons that can be attributed to BNB‚Äôs multi-year ascent. The token boasts a Sharpe ratio of 2.5, indicating that for every dollar of risk taken, the return was $2.5. This means that BNB has experienced significantly lower drawdowns compared to most cryptos and traditional market indices, offering investors a more stable and attractive risk-reward profile over the past five years. It‚Äôs not quite Bitcoin, but it is BNB ‚Äì the second ‚ÄúB‚Äù former Binance CEO CZ used to jokingly remind his followers not to bet against. But putting its superior Sharpe ratio and relatively low volatility aside, there may be a simpler reason why BNB has broken out in the past week: it was its turn. Bitcoin has done Bitcoin things all year. And in recent weeks, ETH has finally started to move up. The next candidate on the list is BNB, both on account of its market capitalization and deep integration. BNB is everywhere, and unlike BTC, its holders are even willing to use it for payments and rewards. BNB Utility Fuels Value Flywheel It would be fair to say that BNB began life as an exchange token. It would also be fair to say that it has long since escaped that box. While Binance‚Äôs shadow still looms large over the exchange landscape, using BNB to obtain discounted trading fees is just one use case among many. As the Binance ecosystem has expanded over the last five years, so have the places where BNB is accepted. It‚Äôs still an integral part of Binance‚Äôs global exchange and BNB Chain of course, but it‚Äôs also transcended these ecosystems to gain its own trajectory. Beyond blockchain, BNB is expanding into real-world use cases like payments via Binance Pay and travel bookings on Travala.com , bridging digital assets with everyday life. Institutional adoption is also growing, with corporate treasury demand even surpassing Ethereum‚Äôs. Supporting this ecosystem is BNB‚Äôs deflationary tokenomics: an auto-burn mechanism has permanently removed 31% of the total supply, enhancing the notion of scarcity and driving long-term value. On Binance‚Äôs centralized exchange, BNB holders get their share of perks including access to token sales and staking opportunities that lock up supply and incentivize long-term holding. Meanwhile, BNB Chain‚Äôs multi-layer framework, including its Layer 1 as well as the opBNB Layer 2, continue to drive demand for the native asset. Elsewhere it‚Äôs being used in everything from decentralized storage on Greenfield to serving as DeFi collateral. Outside of ETH, no other asset has this level of everyday utility and adoption. And that‚Äôs why BNB is flying. Wen Alt Season? While there‚Äôs no question that BNB has followed BTC and ETH‚Äôs lead in rallying strongly, the question of whether this means alt season is imminent has still to be settled. Definitions of this period, during which the long tail of crypto assets outperform majors, vary, but Blockchaincenter‚Äôs index holds that when 75% of the top 50 coins have outperformed Bitcoin over the last 90 days, alt season has arrived. Its index currently sits at 39, but briefly flirted with 60 in recent days. We‚Äôre not quite there, in other words, but we‚Äôre close. Sentiment among seasoned crypto traders appears to be that alt season will arrive but that it will be shorter than previous cycles. Potentially on course to kick in by early to mid-August, this could see altcoins significantly increase their total capitalization for several months in succession. Despite this, many alts are still down significantly on their previous ATH will struggle to regain this territory ‚Äì even ETH is still down 30% from its all-time high, despite its bullish performance over the past 30 days. BNB, in comparison, finds itself in the same position as BTC: teasing new highs as the crypto market grinds its way upwards. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

HEADLINE: Did the U.S. government just dump $20B in Bitcoin?
SUMMARY: A rumor has been spreading in the past week or so that the U.S. government may have quietly dumped nearly 170,000 Bitcoin ( BTC ), worth around $20 billion in total. Namely, while the Freedom of Information Request response from the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS) did disclose a total of 28,988 BTC in holdings, valued at approximately $3.4 billion, the fact remains that other federal departments hold the cryptocurrency as well. In total, the government still holds nearly 198,000 BTC across various wallets owned by the FBI, DOJ, DEA, and several U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Offices, which translates to about $23.5 billion, as the most recent data published by Arkham Intelligence suggests. U.S. Government crypto moves. Source: Arkham Government crypto moves Some of the government‚Äôs BTC holdings have been partially liquidated, for example, around 41,700 BTC of the 51,680 BTC seized from James Zhong‚Äôs Silk Road stash. However, Arkham confirms that no tracked wallets have made any such moves in over four months, suggesting no ongoing liquidation activity. Likewise, not all seized Bitcoin has been legally forfeited, and some of it may be held pending court decisions. This has created a lot of confusion regarding how much ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù the government really owns as opposed to just holding for the time being. Bitcoin price remains stable Despite the rumors, the Bitcoin price has remained relatively stable. At press time, the cryptocurrency was trading at approximately $118,200, down just 0.08% over the past seven days. BTC 7-day price chart. Source: Finbold Of course, macroeconomic pressures remain, with the Federal Reserve‚Äôs restrictive interest rate range of 5.25%‚Äì5.50% and a potential $5 trillion U.S. debt ceiling expansion. Further inflation, however, could further drive Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a hedge. The market is also expecting the results of the upcoming release of President Donald Trump‚Äôs crypto task force report, scheduled for July 30. Marking six months since the formation of the presidential digital assets working group, the report could become one of the most important crypto policy documents in 2025, likely addressing regulatory reform and stablecoin oversight. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Did the U.S. government just dump $20B in Bitcoin? appeared first on Finbold .

In total, the government still holds nearly 198,000 BTC across various wallets owned by the FBI, DOJ, DEA, and several U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Offices, which translates to about $23.5 billion, as the most recent data published by Arkham Intelligence suggests. Source: Arkham Government crypto moves Some of the government‚Äôs BTC holdings have been partially liquidated, for example, around 41,700 BTC of the 51,680 BTC seized from James Zhong‚Äôs Silk Road stash. However, Arkham confirms that no tracked wallets have made any such moves in over four months, suggesting no ongoing liquidation activity. Likewise, not all seized Bitcoin has been legally forfeited, and some of it may be held pending court decisions. This has created a lot of confusion regarding how much ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù the government really owns as opposed to just holding for the time being. Bitcoin price remains stable Despite the rumors, the Bitcoin price has remained relatively stable. At press time, the cryptocurrency was trading at approximately $118,200, down just 0.08% over the past seven days. BTC 7-day price chart. Source: Finbold Of course, macroeconomic pressures remain, with the Federal Reserve‚Äôs restrictive interest rate range of 5.25%‚Äì5.50% and a potential $5 trillion U.S. debt ceiling expansion. Further inflation, however, could further drive Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a hedge. The market is also expecting the results of the upcoming release of President Donald Trump‚Äôs crypto task force report, scheduled for July 30. Marking six months since the formation of the presidential digital assets working group, the report could become one of the most important crypto policy documents in 2025, likely addressing regulatory reform and stablecoin oversight. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Did the U.S. government just dump $20B in Bitcoin? appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Altcoin Season Hope Dim as Traders Unwind Bullish Bets: Crypto Daybook Americas
SUMMARY: By Omkar Godbole (All times ET unless indicated otherwise) Bitcoin''s (BTC) consolidation continues to take the wind out of the bull run in the broader market that had raised hopes for the so-called alt season marked by prolonged outperformance of alternative cryptocurrencies. Over the past 24 hours, major altcoins have experienced a significant decline, led by a double-digit drop in the payments-focused XRP and an 8% slide in SOL. The CoinDesk 80 Index, which tracks the performance of altcoins, has dropped over 7% while the CoinDesk 20 Index, which is dominated by bitcoin and ether, has declined by 4%. "The crypto market took a nosedive, losing almost 4% of its market cap over the last 24 hours. Without bitcoin''s growth, altcoins, which had been driving the market upwards in previous days, found themselves on sale. Forty-eight of the top 100 altcoins are losing double-digit rates over 24 hours, while only three are growing," Alex Kuptsikevich, chief market analyst at¬†FxPro, said in an email. Amid all this, social media is abuzz with posts about some $2 billion worth of ether waiting to be unstaked , with over 475 Ethereum validators awaiting exit. (check chart of the day section). Some are drawing parallels with January 2024, when large unstaking marked a temporary price top. The latest surge in unstaking appears to be driven by the soaring ether borrowing rates on decentralized platforms like Aave, which have diminished the appeal of looping strategies designed to boost ether staking yields. Typically, these strategies involve users depositing liquidity staking (LST) or liquid restaking tokens (LRT) as collateral on platforms like AAVE and borrow ETH. The borrowed ETH is again converted to LRT and LSTs and redeposited, creating a loop. The strategy works when staking yields are greater than borrowing costs. However, with borrowing costs on the rise, the loop is likely being reversed, leading traders to rush to repay loans, exit LST/LRT, and reclaim ETH. "The real trigger is soaring ETH borrowing rates since July 16 (peaking at 18%). This forced mass unwinding of ETH leverage loops on Aave, as negative yield spreads crushed profitability. Traders rushed to repay loans, exit LST/LRT positions, and reclaim ETH ‚Äî causing depegs and queue congestion," pseudonymous observer Degen Station noted on X. It added that arbitrageurs are now scooping up LSTs and LRTs at a discount to redeem them for ether, worsening the issue, while demand for new staking remains strong. To cut to the chase, the large queue for unstaking is not necessarily a bearish signal. In other key news, Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino said that the company is planning to re-enter the U.S. with stablecoin offerings for payments, interbank settlements, and trading. In traditional markets, major currencies traded flat against the U.S. dollar, except for the risk-sensitive AUD/USD pair, which crossed above resistance at 0.66. Traders were closely watching for signs of sustainability as failure could be a harbinger of broad-based risk aversion. Stay Alert! What to Watch Crypto July 28: Starknet (STRK), an Ethereum layer-2 validity rollup (zk-rollup), launches v0.14.0 on mainnet. July 31, 12 p.m.: A live webinar featuring Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan and Bitzenship founder Aleesandro Palombo discussing bitcoin‚Äôs potential as the next global reserve currency amid de-dollarization trends. Registration link . Aug. 1: The Helium Network (HNT), now running on Solana, undergoes its halving event , cutting annual new token issuance to 7.5 million HNT. Aug. 15: Record date for the next FTX distribution to holders of allowed Class 5 Customer Entitlement, Class 6 General Unsecured and Convenience Claims who meet pre-distribution requirements. Macro July 24, 8:15 a.m.: The European Central Bank will announce its interest rate decision, with President Christine Lagarde''s press conference following 30 minutes later. Livestream link . Main Refinancing Operations (MRO) rate Est. 1.9% vs. Prev. 2.15% July 24, 9:45 a.m.: S&P Global releases (flash) July U.S. data on manufacturing and services activity. Composite PMI Prev. 52.9 Manufacturing PMI Est. 52.6 vs. Prev. 52.9 Services PMI Est. 53 vs. Prev. 52.9 July 24, 4 p.m.: President Donald Trump will visit the Federal Reserve headquarters, highlighting his public disagreements with Chair Jerome Powell and Fed monetary policy. July 25, 8:30 a.m.: The U.S. Census Bureau releases June manufactured durable goods orders data. Durable Goods Orders MoM Est. -10.8% vs. Prev. 16.4% Durable Goods Orders Ex Defense MoM Prev. 15.5% Durable Goods Orders Ex Transportation MoM Est. 0.1% vs. Prev. 0.5% Aug. 1, 12:01 a.m.: New U.S. tariffs take effect on imports from trading partners that failed to reach agreements by the July 9 deadline. These increased duties could range from 10% to as high as 70%, impacting a wide range of goods. Earnings (Estimates based on FactSet data) July 29: PayPal Holdings ( PYPL ), pre-market, $1.30 July 30: Robinhood M

HEADLINE: Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Wakes Up After 14 Years, Worth $468 Million Today
SUMMARY: The post Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Wakes Up After 14 Years, Worth $468 Million Today appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News A long-inactive Bitcoin address holding 3,962 BTC has reactivated after 14.5 years. The wallet first received these coins in January 2011, when one bitcoin was just $0.393, making the stash worth only $1,453 back then. Today, the same amount of bitcoin is valued at about $468 million. The wallet had remained untouched ever since. Its sudden movement has sparked curiosity across the crypto community, especially amid recent market volatility.

Its sudden movement has sparked curiosity across the crypto community, especially amid recent market volatility.

HEADLINE: Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 24, 2025
SUMMARY: Over the past 24 hours, the cryptocurrency market capitalization has dropped by another 5.6%, dipping below $4 trillion, now standing at $3.91 trillion. The market is down today, with the large majority of the top 100 coins per market capitalization turning red. At the same time, the total crypto trading volume is at $264 billion. TLDR: Crypto market cap fell below $4 trillion; Large majority of top 100 coins have dropped in 24 hours; BTC and ETH are both down, trading at $118,256 and $3,574; Market sentiment decreased slightly today; US ETH spot ETFs continue the inflow streak, US BTC spot ETFs see further outflows; ‚ÄôInvestor appetite for the two biggest blockchains is undeniable‚Äô; ‚ÄôThe real opportunity lies at the intersection of Bitcoin and Ethereum‚Äô. Crypto Winners & Losers Over the past 24 hours, all top 10 coins per market capitalization have turned red. Bitcoin (BTC) decreased by only 0.2% in a day, meaning it‚Äôs unchanged. The current price is $118,256, holding above the $118,000 level. BTC‚Äôs is the lowest fall on this list. Then, Ethereum (ETH) is down by 2.6% over the same period. It‚Äôs now trading at $3,574. This is the second lowest decrease. Two coins saw double-digit drops. XRP (XRP) fell the most in this category: 12.1% to $3.05. Also, Dogecoin (DOGE) dropped 10.7%, now trading at $0.2303. The other coins in this category saw decreases between 3% and 8% each. In the top 100 coins category, only four coins are green, and only one had an increase above 0.3%. Story (IP) appreciated 3.8% to $5.13. At the same time, some 25 coins recorded double-digit drops. The highest of these are 16.3% and 15.6% by Aptos (APT) and Flare (FLR) , now trading at $4.59 and $0.02205. Moreover, PUMP , the native token of Pump.Fun , dropped 20% in 24 hours after founder Alon Cohen said there is no immediate token airdrop. ‚ÄúWe want to make sure that it is a meaningful airdrop and it is executed well,‚Äù Cohen said . ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre actually focusing on bringing back a lot of that attention and hype to our ecosystem. That being said, the airdrop is not going to be taking place in the immediate future.‚Äù Allon speaks about the pumpfun airdrop live on threadguy stream, "We want to reward OG pumpfun users" pic.twitter.com/gdfE7H4oRV ‚Äî Ÿã (@0xsyste) July 23, 2025 Meanwhile, bankrupt crypto exchange FTX said it would begin its next round of cash distributions to creditors on or around 30 September. The payments will be processed through FTX‚Äôs designated distribution partners, including BitGo , Kraken , and Payoneer . Industry is Shifting to Bitcoin-Ethereum Interconnection James Harris, Group CEO of digital asset firm Tesseract , commented that ‚Äúcrypto hitting $4 trillion in total market cap earlier this month was a serious milestone, and while we‚Äôve seen a bit of a pullback in the past couple of days, the rally has been driven by a combination of structural and cyclical forces.‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a powerful trifecta: regulatory clarity, macro easing, and corporate adoption. Together, they‚Äôre pushing crypto from speculative asset to serious portfolio contender. That said, these same forces can reverse ‚Äî so while the momentum is real, disciplined risk management remains essential.‚Äù Also, Dom Harz, co-founder of hybrid chain BOB , commented that Ethereum ETFs saw the third-largest day of inflows in history this week. They also celebrated their one-year anniversary yesterday, coming far since their launch. The high inflows may be the result of buy-in from investors who ‚Äúmissed out‚Äù on BTC, which hit a new record high of $122,000 the week prior. ‚ÄúEither way, investor appetite for the two biggest blockchains is undeniable,‚Äù Harz says. What‚Äôs more, this momentum is not showing signs of slowing down. ETH is ‚Äúoutperforming the original blockchain so far this month. Institutional investors are taking note, and many major players are announcing plans to grow their ETH treasuries.‚Äù Therefore, Harz argues, ‚Äúthe real opportunity lies at the intersection of Bitcoin and Ethereum.‚Äù Fast developments in innovations like BitVM and Bitcoin DeFi are making ‚Äúthe idea that investors must look beyond Bitcoin for DeFi opportunities‚Äù outdated. ‚ÄúThe industry is experiencing a shift toward a more interconnected future, where Bitcoin‚Äôs robust security and Ethereum‚Äôs programmability align to drive broader adoption without compromising decentralization,‚Äù Harz concludes. Levels & Events to Watch Next At the time of writing, BTC trades at $118,256. Its intraday high was $119,197, after which the price fell to the intraday low of $117,422, before returning to the current level. The coin still stands above $118,000 and is trying to hold on to it. It has dipped below this level several times over the past 24 hours. Observers are now looking to see if it will manage to keep the level and move upwards again, or if it will drop below it, possibly into the $116,700 zone. Keep an eye on the $120,094 mark, after which the price could move above $122,000 and towards $128,000. Bitcoin Price Ch

HEADLINE: Crypto Market Surges Today: Three Major Catalysts Fueling the Rally
SUMMARY: The crypto market advanced on Thursday, buoyed by institutional inflows, political support in Washington, and renewed risk appetite in altcoins. With visibility a growing priority for emerging projects in this bullish environment, firms like Outset PR are stepping in to shape how narratives align with momentum. Bitcoin (BTC) hovered above $118,000, extending gains after bouncing off technical support earlier this week. Ethereum retreated modestly but remains up nearly 9% month-to-date. Below is a review of three key drivers behind the move: regulatory clarity, ETF momentum, and capital rotation into altcoins. 1. Political Tailwinds and Regulatory Clarity The biggest boost to the market this week comes from pro-crypto legislation in the United States. Two pivotal bills‚Äîthe GENIUS Act and the CLARITY for Payment Stablecoins Act‚Äîhave gained strong support in Congress, with backing from the current administration and influential financial figures. The Market Impact: The GENIUS Act provides a regulatory framework for stablecoin issuance and use, encouraging innovation while ensuring consumer protection. The CLARITY Act establishes clear guidelines for how stablecoins can be used for payments, addressing longstanding compliance concerns. This wave of crypto-friendly regulation signals a seismic shift in Washington‚Äôs stance on digital assets, offering long-awaited legal clarity that institutional investors demand. It sets the stage for the mainstream adoption of crypto as a viable component of the global financial system. 2. Institutional Inflows via Bitcoin ETFs The second catalyst is the ongoing wave of institutional demand, primarily funneled through spot Bitcoin ETFs approved earlier this year. Industry giants like BlackRock, Fidelity, and Grayscale have continued to accumulate Bitcoin on behalf of their clients. Key Stats: Bitcoin ETFs have seen billions in inflows over the last two months. Institutional accumulation has helped Bitcoin maintain support levels above $115,000, despite short-term volatility. Trading volume on regulated crypto exchanges has spiked, a sign of growing confidence among large investors. These ETFs have effectively bridged the gap between traditional finance and digital assets, opening the door for 401(k) funds, hedge funds, and family offices to enter the market without touching crypto wallets or exchanges. The result is a stable foundation for price growth, anchored in long-term capital. 3. Altcoin Season Ignites as Bitcoin Dominance Drops The third factor fueling today‚Äôs rally is the resurgence of altcoin activity, often referred to as the beginning of ‚Äúaltseason.‚Äù As Bitcoin consolidates gains, traders are rotating capital into smaller-cap cryptocurrencies that tend to outperform during bull runs. What''s Driving It: Bitcoin dominance has fallen by over 7% in the last 30 days, indicating a shift toward altcoins. Projects in the AI, DeFi, meme, and gaming sectors are seeing double-digit daily gains. Tokens like Solana, Chainlink, and various Layer-2 ecosystems are attracting fresh liquidity. This trend marks the return of risk-on sentiment, where investors are more willing to chase high-reward opportunities. While volatility may rise, it also opens the door for significant upside in under-the-radar tokens. In a Fragmented Narrative, Outset PR Sharpens the Message As crypto projects race to capitalize on the current rally, narrative clarity and timing have never mattered more ‚Äî and that‚Äôs where Outset PR has carved out a competitive edge. Founded by crypto PR visionary Mike Ermolaev, Outset PR blends data intelligence with a boutique approach, operating less like a traditional agency and more like a market-fit workshop. Campaigns are not dictated by templates or generic placements ‚Äî they are built to move with the market. Outset PR‚Äôs approach includes: Editorial precision: Writers with journalistic and analytics backgrounds tailor content for both impact and indexability. Tier-1 targeting: Strong relationships with major editors power curated outreach strategies that consistently land coverage in high-value publications. Performance-driven reach: Using proprietary traffic modeling, Outset PR positions content across high-CTR surfaces ‚Äî pushing brand visibility far beyond traditional SEO. While many agencies focus on vanity metrics, Outset PR focuses on momentum, trust-building, and actual results. For early-stage and growth-phase projects navigating the current bull environment, it offers a visible edge in attention acquisition and media lift. üëâ Contact Outset PR today to align your story with market momentum What‚Äôs Next for the Crypto Market? With favorable legislation, strong institutional participation, and growing interest in altcoins, the crypto market appears to be entering a new bullish phase. However, traders should watch for: Regulatory decisions on Ethereum ETF proposals Macroeconomic indicators like interest rates and inflation data Momentum sustainability across mid-cap

Altcoin Season Ignites as Bitcoin Dominance Drops The third factor fueling today‚Äôs rally is the resurgence of altcoin activity, often referred to as the beginning of ‚Äúaltseason.‚Äù As Bitcoin consolidates gains, traders are rotating capital into smaller-cap cryptocurrencies that tend to outperform during bull runs. What''s Driving It: Bitcoin dominance has fallen by over 7% in the last 30 days, indicating a shift toward altcoins. Projects in the AI, DeFi, meme, and gaming sectors are seeing double-digit daily gains. Tokens like Solana, Chainlink, and various Layer-2 ecosystems are attracting fresh liquidity. This trend marks the return of risk-on sentiment, where investors are more willing to chase high-reward opportunities. While volatility may rise, it also opens the door for significant upside in under-the-radar tokens. In a Fragmented Narrative, Outset PR Sharpens the Message As crypto projects race to capitalize on the current rally, narrative clarity and timing have never mattered more ‚Äî and that‚Äôs where Outset PR has carved out a competitive edge. Founded by crypto PR visionary Mike Ermolaev, Outset PR blends data intelligence with a boutique approach, operating less like a traditional agency and more like a market-fit workshop. Campaigns are not dictated by templates or generic placements ‚Äî they are built to move with the market. Outset PR‚Äôs approach includes: Editorial precision: Writers with journalistic and analytics backgrounds tailor content for both impact and indexability. Tier-1 targeting: Strong relationships with major editors power curated outreach strategies that consistently land coverage in high-value publications. Performance-driven reach: Using proprietary traffic modeling, Outset PR positions content across high-CTR surfaces ‚Äî pushing brand visibility far beyond traditional SEO. While many agencies focus on vanity metrics, Outset PR focuses on momentum, trust-building, and actual results. For early-stage and growth-phase projects navigating the current bull environment, it offers a visible edge in attention acquisition and media lift. üëâ Contact Outset PR today to align your story with market momentum What‚Äôs Next for the Crypto Market? HEADLINE: Bybit Card Celebrates Two Million Users with Limited-Edition Collectible and 1 BTC Giveaway
SUMMARY: DUBAI , UAE , July 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ ‚Äî Bybit , the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, is excited to announce a major milestone in elevating the everyday crypto experience. With over two million Bybit Card holders and counting, the Bybit Card is introducing a 2M limited-edition virtual collectible and offering participants the chance to win a full BTC . The campaign celebrates the shared vision of prosperity as the mainstreaming of the digital asset class accelerates. From now until August 24, 2025 , new and current Bybit Card customers may register for the event to unveil their very own Bybit Card 2M limited-edition virtual collectible‚Äîa collective symbol of belief, purpose, and progress as an early participant of the cryptocurrency ecosystem, right in their digital wallet. Once the card is activated, eligible participants will enjoy up to 10% in cashback for 30 days and stand to win 1 BTC upon completing spending tasks. The event features two ways to reward both new and existing Bybit Card users: Refer and Earn¬†Cashback enables users to unlock temporary reward tier upgrades through successful referrals. Users who refer two or more friends will receive an extra 2% in cashback for a week, or up to three weeks with six or more successful referrals. Buy More, Win More transforms everyday spending into winning opportunities. Every 50 USDT spent earns participants one lucky draw ticket for prizes including USDT and BTC airdrops. High-volume spenders receive additional privileges, with prizes ranging from exclusive lounge access, premium Astari wearables, to the grand trophy of 1 BTC . Key Features: Crypto convenience : seamless fiat-to-crypto spending, and cash withdrawals from supported ATMs around the world with the physical card available to Mastercard holders. No annual fees and up to 8% APR on balances. Year-round perks: 100% rebates on subscriptions including Netflix, Spotify, and selected AI tools, airport lounge access, and other benefits refreshed seasonally Multi-asset transactions and¬†cashback : supporting transactions in BTC, ETH, XRP, TON, USDT, USDC, MNT, and BNB; cashback options in USDC, USDT, BTC, and AVAX, with more options on the way. The promotion is on a first-come, first served basis for a limited time only. Terms and conditions apply. To learn more about the Bybit Card‚Äôs rewards tiers and cashback scheme, user may visit: Bybit Point Rewards #Bybit / #TheCryptoArk / #BybitCard /#IMakeIt2M About¬†Bybit Bybit is the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 70 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com . HEADLINE: NBA Star Scottie Pippen Reveals Top 4 Crypto Predictions for 2026
SUMMARY: The post NBA Star Scottie Pippen Reveals Top 4 Crypto Predictions for 2026 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News NBA legend Scottie Pippen has just made some bold calls in the crypto space, and the internet is paying attention. Best known for winning six championships with the Chicago Bulls, Pippen recently took to X to share his 2026 price predictions for top cryptocurrencies. He even asked his 729,000 followers to vote on which ones they believe could actually happen. Pippen has long shown support for Bitcoin and has even claimed to have spoken with Satoshi Nakamoto in a dream. But this time, he‚Äôs going beyond Bitcoin, showing love for Ethereum, XRP, and Solana. The big question is, are these predictions based on anything solid, or are they just for fun? Pippen‚Äôs 2026 Crypto Price Predictions According to Pippen, by 2026: Bitcoin could soar to $233,000 Ethereum might hit $10,000 XRP could reach $10 Solana might jump to $1,000 He also referenced Elon Musk‚Äôs recent promise that by next year, Tesla‚Äôs Optimus robots would be delivering food at the company‚Äôs new diner while people wait for their cars to charge. Which one of these will happen in 2026: ‚Ä¢ Bitcoin will hit 233k ‚Ä¢ $ETH will hit $10k ‚Ä¢ $SOL will hit $1k ‚Ä¢ $XRP will hit $10 ‚Ä¢ Your UBER driver will tell you about the @game5ball ‚Ä¢ Optimus will deliver you food ‚Ä¢ Aliens will invade ‚Ä¢ 2pac returns ‚Äî Scottie Pippen (@ScottiePippen) July 24, 2025 If that wasn‚Äôt futuristic enough, Pippen asked followers whether they believe Earth will be invaded by aliens in 2026. While some users were amused, others focused on the price targets. Many agreed XRP at $10 and Solana at $1,000 felt possible, but few seemed convinced that Bitcoin would climb all the way to $233,000. Will Pippen‚Äôs Crypto Predictions Come True? Between Pippen‚Äôs surprising predictions and Ripple‚Äôs mysterious transfers, crypto watchers have plenty to think about. Is XRP really on track to hit $10? Can Bitcoin break the $200K mark in just a year? No one knows for sure.

HEADLINE: Mysterious Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Awakens After 14.5 Years
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Mysterious Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Awakens After 14.5 Years In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where market movements can be triggered by a whisper, the sudden activity of a dormant Bitcoin wallet can send ripples of intrigue and speculation across the globe. Imagine a digital treasure chest, locked away and untouched for over a decade, suddenly showing a sign of life. This isn‚Äôt a scene from a sci-fi movie; it‚Äôs the reality of a recent event that has captured the attention of the crypto community. What Just Happened with This Dormant Bitcoin Wallet? The crypto analytics platform Lookonchain recently brought to light a fascinating development via X (formerly Twitter): a Bitcoin whale wallet, holding a staggering 3,962 BTC ‚Äì an amount valued at approximately $468 million at the time of the report ‚Äì has stirred from its 14.5-year slumber. The wallet, which had been inactive since its creation, made a minimal test transaction of 0.0018 BTC (worth around $218). This isn‚Äôt just any transaction; it‚Äôs a significant event for several reasons: Long-Term Dormancy: 14.5 years is an exceptionally long period for such a large sum of Bitcoin to remain untouched. This suggests the owner either lost access, was a very early adopter with extreme conviction, or simply forgot about it. Significant Holdings: With nearly 4,000 BTC, this wallet represents a substantial portion of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply, making its movements potentially impactful. The ‚ÄòTest‚Äô Transaction: The small amount sent is characteristic of a test transaction, typically performed to verify wallet access and functionality before a larger transfer. This indicates the owner has regained or confirmed control. The identity of the wallet owner remains shrouded in mystery, as is common with pseudonymous blockchain transactions. However, the sheer volume of BTC involved naturally leads to questions about the potential implications for the broader market. Why Does an Awakened Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Matter? The awakening of such a long-inactive, large-volume dormant Bitcoin wallet can spark a flurry of speculation and analysis within the crypto ecosystem. Here‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a big deal: 1. Potential Market Impact: Selling Pressure: The primary concern is that the whale might be preparing to sell their substantial holdings. A sudden influx of 3,962 BTC onto exchanges could create significant selling pressure, potentially leading to a price drop, especially in a less liquid market. Market Confidence: Conversely, if the whale moves the funds to a secure, non-exchange wallet, or simply holds them, it could be interpreted as a sign of continued confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value, potentially boosting sentiment. 2. Historical Precedents: Historically, movements from long-dormant wallets have often preceded significant market events. While not every awakening leads to a crash, they are closely watched. For instance, the movement of early Bitcoin blocks (mined in 2010 or earlier) often generates similar buzz due to the massive unrealized gains involved and the potential for large-scale selling. Notable Dormant Wallet Awakenings & Potential Outcomes Year of Awakening Amount (BTC) Dormancy Period Common Speculation Recent (2024) 3,962 14.5 years Market dump, security transfer, lost keys found 2020 50 11 years Early miner selling, testing old keys 2021 1,000+ 8+ years Institutional movement, long-term holder redistribution Who Are These Bitcoin Whales, Anyway? The term ‚ÄòBitcoin whale‚Äô refers to an individual or entity holding a very large amount of Bitcoin. These are often early adopters, institutional investors, or large-scale traders whose actions can significantly influence market dynamics due to the sheer volume of their holdings. Their movements are tracked by blockchain analytics firms like Lookonchain, Arkham Intelligence, and Glassnode, providing insights into potential market shifts. The awakening of a dormant Bitcoin wallet belonging to such a whale is particularly noteworthy because their decisions can create a ripple effect, influencing smaller investors and traders. Are they about to take profits? Are they moving funds for security reasons? Or are they simply re-organizing their portfolio? These questions drive the narrative around such events. What Could Trigger a Dormant Bitcoin Wallet to Awaken? Inheritance or Estate Settlement: The original owner may have passed away, and their heirs or estate executors have finally gained access to the funds. This process can often take years. BitcoinWorld Mysterious Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Awakens After 14.5 Years In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, where market movements can be triggered by a whisper, the sudden activity of a dormant Bitcoin wallet can send ripples of intrigue and speculation across the globe. Imagine a digital treasure chest, locked away and untouched for over a decade, suddenly showing a sign of life. This isn‚Äôt a scene from a sci-fi movie; it‚Äôs the reality of a recent event that has captured the attention of the crypto community. What Just Happened with This Dormant Bitcoin Wallet? The crypto analytics platform Lookonchain recently brought to light a fascinating development via X (formerly Twitter): a Bitcoin whale wallet, holding a staggering 3,962 BTC ‚Äì an amount valued at approximately $468 million at the time of the report ‚Äì has stirred from its 14.5-year slumber. The wallet, which had been inactive since its creation, made a minimal test transaction of 0.0018 BTC (worth around $218). This isn‚Äôt just any transaction; it‚Äôs a significant event for several reasons: Long-Term Dormancy: 14.5 years is an exceptionally long period for such a large sum of Bitcoin to remain untouched. This suggests the owner either lost access, was a very early adopter with extreme conviction, or simply forgot about it. Significant Holdings: With nearly 4,000 BTC, this wallet represents a substantial portion of Bitcoin‚Äôs circulating supply, making its movements potentially impactful. The ‚ÄòTest‚Äô Transaction: The small amount sent is characteristic of a test transaction, typically performed to verify wallet access and functionality before a larger transfer. This indicates the owner has regained or confirmed control. The identity of the wallet owner remains shrouded in mystery, as is common with pseudonymous blockchain transactions. However, the sheer volume of BTC involved naturally leads to questions about the potential implications for the broader market. Why Does an Awakened Dormant Bitcoin Wallet Matter? The awakening of such a long-inactive, large-volume dormant Bitcoin wallet can spark a flurry of speculation and analysis within the crypto ecosystem. Here‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a big deal: 1. Potential Market Impact: Selling Pressure: The primary concern is that the whale might be preparing to sell their substantial holdings. Their movements are tracked by blockchain analytics firms like Lookonchain, Arkham Intelligence, and Glassnode, providing insights into potential market shifts. HEADLINE: BitMEX Co-Founder Arthur Hayes Predicts Strong Year-End Rally for Bitcoin and Ethereum
SUMMARY: The post BitMEX Co-Founder Arthur Hayes Predicts Strong Year-End Rally for Bitcoin and Ethereum appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Arthur Hayes, co-founder of BitMEX, forecasts Bitcoin will soar to $250,000 and Ethereum to $10,000 by the end of 2025, representing gains of over 111% and 179% respectively. He highlights growing institutional adoption, particularly in Ethereum and the DeFi space, where his Maelstrom Fund holds significant investments. Despite recent price dips, Hayes remains confident both assets are poised for substantial rallies, driven by increasing market interest and changing investor sentiment.

HEADLINE: Crypto Breakout Watch: $3.25 Surge Could Ignite XRP‚Äôs Run to $5.50
SUMMARY: XRP‚Äôs Wave 4 Plays Out According to renowned crypto market analyst Man of Bitcoin, a decisive breakout above $3.25 would mark the end of wave-4 in XRP‚Äôs current Elliott Wave cycle, signaling a bottom and paving the way for a powerful rally. The analyst noted , ‚ÄúWave-(C) of 4 has completed a 5-wave move to the downside, the pattern is now technically complete.A break above $3.25 would be the first confirmation that wave-4 has bottomed. For now, the possibility of another low remains on the table.‚Äù The Elliott Wave Theory, often used by technical analysts to predict market cycles, suggests that XRP is currently completing wave-4, a corrective phase following its pullback to the psychological price of $3.00. At the time of this writing, XRP had gained some momentum to trade at $3.09, according to CoinGecko data . Crypto pundit XRPunkie shares similar sentiments that XRP is presently at the wave 4 correction phase. The techical analyst pointed out that XRP may have completed its wave 4 correction, though a dip to $2.64 remains possible before Wave 5 begins, which could see a bullish run to $5.50. XRPunkie added, ‚ÄúPullbacks are part of the game. Enjoy the ride to higher prices soon.‚Äù Notably, wave-4 corrections typically precede explosive upward moves, and a confirmed breakout above $3.25 would invalidate bearish structures, signaling that wave-5 has begun. Conclusion XRP‚Äôs battle at $3.25 could be the turning point for a fresh wave of upside depending on whether wave 4 has bottomed at the present price of $3.09. If this is the case, the next major target might be $5.50, a level not seen in XRP‚Äôs history and a potential signal that a new bull phase is underway.

HEADLINE: XRP Eyes Record High Despite Recent Price Dip
SUMMARY: XRP remains positioned for a potential breakout despite a sharp pullback in the last 24 hours, according to market observers. The token saw a 10% decline, falling to $3.21, but analysts suggest its long-term trajectory could still push it beyond its previous all-time high if the broader crypto market momentum continues. Lukas Enzersdorfer-Konrad, deputy CEO at Bitpanda, noted that while predicting exact levels is challenging in fast-moving markets, XRP surpassing its 2018 peak would not be surprising if conditions remain favorable and capital continues to rotate from Bitcoin into altcoins. Altcoin Season Provides Tailwinds for XRP XRP recently touched a year-to-date high of $3.66 but has yet to retest its all-time high of $3.84, set in January 2018. Analysts attribute the potential for further gains to the ongoing strength across the altcoin sector, driven by a shift in investor sentiment and capital flows. CoinMarketCap‚Äôs Altcoin Season Index, which gauges the market‚Äôs appetite for altcoins relative to Bitcoin, transitioned from ‚ÄúBitcoin Season‚Äù to ‚ÄúAltcoin Season‚Äù on Sunday. This shift aligns with a notable drop in Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance, which has decreased by over 5% in the past month as traders explore opportunities in alternative cryptocurrencies. Enzersdorfer-Konrad emphasized that the 3rd larget crypto‚Äôs movement is heavily tied to broader altcoin sentiment, suggesting that continued liquidity and confidence in the altcoin space will be crucial for sustaining the rally. ‚ÄúXRP tends to be highly sensitive to broader altcoin sentiment and regulatory narratives,‚Äù he said, adding that the next phase will depend on whether momentum expands across other altcoins or remains concentrated in select tokens. Analysts See Upside Potential Towards $10 Crypto analyst Dom recently projected that XRP could climb to a range between $7 and $10 if the current market dynamics continue to favor altcoins . However, the outlook for the crypto remains intertwined with the overall performance of the crypto market, with investors watching for signals of sustained altcoin strength. For now, XRP‚Äôs path higher will rely on the market‚Äôs ability to maintain momentum while navigating the volatility that has long characterized the digital asset sector, as the token eyes reclaim and surpass its historical peak in the coming months. The post XRP Eyes Record High Despite Recent Price Dip appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .
